post.body: hey, we're all looking the same direction. haha
I have almond bark for you! heehee
I have never seen White Christmas....ist that bad?
I KNOW! I tried to call you right back!
and I may or may not have peeked at a present. =O shhhh!
my thoughts exactly. I'm staring at my present under the tree and my palms are itching.
YEAH!! YOu are blogging again? Why not start up at your old one again?
your snow looks like our snow! hahaha!
that's how I eat my crackers. haha!
we're all still up and going crazy around here. *sigh*
oh! You figured it out! hahaha!
heehee btw, scroll along the right end of my tweet and click on the arrow. it will instantly show an @brandolynicole to reply to.
that is GROSS! How/who did that?
just take a bottle of water and tell @inworship you TRIED to bring snow. ;-)
I have no choice but to go to bed....I'm babysitting early!
Leaving my house wears me out. I am SUCH a homebody!
Praise the Lord for neighbors who call and offer to watch your kids so you can go out today!!!! yeah!
